settings.title: Placing an Order Online
settings.answer:
You can order quickly and easily through Fuller.com.
To add items to your Shopping cart, simply click on "Add to cart" for the item you wish to buy.
To remove an item, go to your Shopping cart and select "Remove".
To change the quantity of items, go to your Shopping Basket and change the number in the box under the "Qty" column.

settings.title: Signing into My account
settings.answer: If you are a returning customer, and have finished adding items to your shopping basket and want to checkout, you will be prompted to sign in by providing your e-mail address (login) and password. .If you forgot your password please click on 'forgot my password' and a link to reset your password will be sent to you

settings.title: My Shipping Address
settings.answer:
Make sure to provide precise city, state, and zip code information. Remember to spell out the city to which you are shipping the order. Many times abbreviations, misspellings, and other typos can result in errors in this section.
Fuller.com offers FREE STANDARD SHIPPING on all Contiguous U.S. merchandise orders $75 and over (excluding taxes). For shipments totaling less than $75, there is a delivery charge of $9.99 for Standard shipping. Orders over $75 always ship for free. You can add, edit, or delete shipping addresses while you are in this step of the checkout process. Orders shipped outside the contiguous United States will apply additional shipping charges. Canada customers are responsible paying for all import duties upon receiving shipment.

settings.title: Order Confirmation Email
settings.answer: Immediately after you have successfully placed your order with Fuller.com, you will receive an email that contains information regarding the details of your order. The order confirmation email is your receipt that can be printed for your records. The order confirmation email includes your order number (the same number that appeared on our web site after successful submission of an order), the details of the products and corresponding prices, any credits or promotional discounts, taxes, shipping charges (if applicable), your ship-to and bill-to information, and the ship method.

settings.title: Account Registration
settings.answer:
To register, all you need to provide is your name, e-mail address, and password. You can fill out the rest of your account information including shipping, billing address, and personal options at your leisure. Once registered, you can check your order status, order history, and manage your account.
You can change your account information at any time, as well as check the status of your latest orders. As always, you have the option to (un)subscribe to member benefits by clicking on the appropriate subscription box within your profile.
Each time you visit online, you should immediately sign in by clicking on the Account link . This will give you access to your account.

settings.title: Placing Telephone Orders
settings.answer: You can order quickly and easily by calling our toll free number 1-800-235-1938 to place your order with our Customer Service Representatives, or you can shop our seasonal catalog, or online. When you place an order through our toll free number, the shipping costs and delivery schedule are the same as our online shipping costs and delivery schedule. If you are having trouble placing your order on our website, please feel free to place a telephone order.

settings.title: Paying with a Credit Card
settings.answer:
We currently accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover Card. When your credit card is authorized, funds are put on hold until the transaction is completed.
Your billing information must be exactly as it appears on your credit card statement.If any numbers are different, the order cannot be processed. Be sure to correctly spell city names and avoid using abbreviations unless that is how your information appears on your statement.
Contact your financial institution if you need the exact billing address associated with your credit card.
For your security, Fuller requires you to enter your 3- or 4-digit card identification number (CID/CVN/CVV/CVC) on all orders for Visa, MasterCard, American Express, and Discover credit cards. See below for help with credit card identification numbers.
Visa/MC/Discover Card Customers:
Your Security Code/CID (Card Identification Number) is in the signature area on the back of the card (it is the last 3 digits AFTER the credit card account number).
Visa/MC/Discover customer CIDS are 3 digits. American Express has 4 digits on the front of the card.

settings.title: Shipping & Delivery
settings.answer:
Most orders are shipped from New Jersey within 1 to 3 business days from the time we receive the order. Your credit card will be billed at the time the order is placed. Orders are shipped via UPS, FedEx, or USPS. Fuller Brush offers free shipping on all contiguous US orders over $75. The shipping and handling charge on all orders under $75 shipped within the contiguous United States, regardless of size is $9.99

Orders shipped outside the contiguous United States will apply additional shipping charges. Canada customers are responsible paying for all import duties upon receiving shipment. Please allow 7-14 business days for delivery. Alaska, Hawaii, Military addresses, U.S. territories and Canada orders may take longer.

settings.title: Payment Information
settings.answer: We accept Visa, MasterCard, Discover and American Express debit and credit cards. Please be assured that our ordering systems offer complete security and privacy.

settings.title: State & Local Taxes
settings.answer: We are required by law to collect applicable state and local sales taxes on all purchases with a shipping address in New Jersey. The correct taxes will be added to your order.

settings.title: Return & Replacements
settings.answer: Our products carry a 100% Customer Satisfaction Guarantee. If, for any reason, you are not satisfied with your purchase, you may return the merchandise bought on www.fuller.com for a replacement or refund within 30 days of purchase date. Shipping and handling fees are to be paid for by the customer. Prior to returning an item, pleaseÂ contactÂ ourÂ returns department via our contact page.Â

settings.title: Manufacturer Warranty
settings.answer: Fuller Brush warrants our products to be free from defects in workmanship and materials, under normal residential use and conditions, for a period of one (1) year for the original invoice date. Shipping and handling fees are to be paid for by the customer. The manufacturer agrees, at its option during the warranty period, to repair and defect in material or workmanship, to replace the product, or to refund the product without charge to the customer (except for a fee for shipping, handling, packing and return postage, which will be incurred by the customer). Such repair or replacement is subject to verification of the defect or malfunction and proof of purchase as confirmed by showing the model number on original dated sales receipt. Prior to returning an item, please contact our warranties at customer@fuller.com.

settings.title: Privacy & Security
settings.answer: At Fuller Brush, protecting your privacy is a priority. We will not share any of your personal information with any third parties. We use this information to fulfill or order and to notify you of your order status. We may also use this information to communicate fantastic offers to you or to tell you about new products and services. If you prefer not to receive this type of communication, please e-mail your request for removal to unsubscribe@fullerbrush.com.

settings.newsletter_title: Sign up to get all updates.

settings.subheading: Use this section to help customers find the products they're looking for.

settings.heading: Thank You:
settings.text_content:
Thank you for reaching out and contacting The â€œOriginalâ€ Fuller Brush Company at www.fuller.com. Since 1906, we have offered American Families the highest quality home care and personal care products.

You have reached this page â€“ by inquiring about the product: Full Crystal. Please be aware â€“ The Fuller Brush Company does NOT manufacture any of the Full Crystal line of products. Full Crystal is manufactured and sold by the SAS Group located at the following address:

SAS Group
220 White Plains Rd
Tarrytown, NY 10591
(877-778-6591 or 914-333-7417)

Again, thank you for searching and finding The â€œOriginalâ€ Fuller Brush Company at www.fuller.com. While you are here, we want you to know - we sincerely appreciate your interest in Fuller Brush, and we would like to extend to you a 10% OFF Coupon Code for a one-time use at this website, www.fuller.com. While completing your Shopping Cart, simply enter fuller10off in the Coupon Code box.

settings.title: If the Full Crystal is NOT manufactured or sold by Fuller Brush â€“ then why is the Fuller Brush name on the product?
settings.answer: The Fuller Brush Company was acquired by the current ownership approximately 2 years ago. Prior to the ownership change, Fuller Brush licensed the name to the SAS Group for Full Crystal. This allows the SAS Group to use the Fuller Brush name on Full Crystal.

settings.title: Can Fuller Brush help me in any way with the Full Crystal product?
settings.answer: No. The SAS Group is NOT associated with Fuller Brush in any way â€“ except with the Licensing Agreement allowing SAS Group to use the Fuller Brush name on Full Crystal.

settings.title: I tried calling the SAS Group at the above telephone numbers, and nobody answers. What should I do now?
settings.answer: Unfortunately, you will have to keep calling the numbers â€“ or, Email the SAS Group at:Â gtyson@sasgroup.com. If your question pertains to credit card charges for Full Crystal, you may need to contact your Credit Card Company.

settings.title: Does Fuller Brush have any information about my order or the amount charged for the order?
settings.answer: No. The Fuller Brush Company has no access to any Full Crystal orders or charges.

settings.title: Does Fuller Brush have any information about: how or where to order, product usage instructions, order cancellations, refunds or returns â€“ or any other information about the product?
settings.answer: Full Crystal product is manufactured and sold by the SAS Group. As such, Fuller Brush has no access to any product, order or return information regarding Full Crystal.

settings.title: If I contact or email Fuller Brush about Full Crystal, will Fuller Brush respond with an answer?
settings.answer: No. The SAS Group manufactures and sells Full Crystal, and only has a License Agreement to use the name Fuller Brush on Full Crystal. All inquiries and issues regarding Full Crystal must be directed to the SAS Group at the above address and contact information.

settings.title: Ask The Experts
settings.text: Ask the experts on cleaning products, find out what best solutions are recommended for different rooms & surfaces

settings.title: Great Fuller Products For Your Outdoor Needs

settings.heading: Made To Last
settings.text_content:
In the good'ol days when products were made to last... wait, you can still get them, yes you guessed it, here at Fuller Brush. With over 100 years of quality, knowledge, and expertise lying behind each and every product we manufacture.

Alfred Fuller started with a hand wired brush machine, manufacturing with his bare hands. He then ran from door to door selling to households across the states, all the while digesting the feedback he received, proving invaluable information where he incorporated them to truly make the best products on the market.

Shop with confidence knowing our products were made with you in mind.

settings.title: Fuller Toilet PodsÂ® Drop In Toilet Bowl Cleaner
settings.subheading: Purchase 1 Pack For $19.95 and when you purchase in increments of 2 receive the 2nd pack for just $9.95! Offer is limited to receiving 5 packs at $9.95
settings.caption: A short description of the video.

settings.heading: Easy Cleaning
settings.text_content:
If youâ€™re looking for an easy way to clean your toilet, look no further. Simply drop a Fuller Brush
Toilet Bowl Cleaner Pod in and let it go to work, then brush or swab. No more squirting, fussing
and messing with chemical liquids!

settings.heading: Powerful Concentrated Cleansers
settings.text_content:
Performing in both hard and soft water, and safe for septic systems, each water-soluble pod unleashes a
multitude of concentrated cleansers that begin emulsifying hard water scale, mineral deposits, stains
and soils. Cleansers will leave your bathroom smelling fresh and clean.

settings.heading: Pre-Measured Dosage
settings.text_content:
You no longer need to worry about using too much or too little of a toilet cleaner. For ease of
use, each 100% biodegradable pod boasts an economical, pre-measured dosage. These
revolutionary toilet cleaning pods dissolve completely and are free of phosphates and chlorine.

settings.heading:
Toilet Cleaning Made Easy!
Drop 1 In, Let It Work, Brush & Flush!

settings.quote: I am very impressed with the cleaning ability of the pods. I have well water and sometimes get rust stains in my bowl this deals with those stains when other cleaners would not. I bought some today for my 88 year old mother in law.

The toilet pods have a pleasant and fresh odor and remove tough bowl stains - I like the fact that the cleaning pods drop-in the bowl and as they dissolve, clean and remove stains, making for easy cleaning. We are happy with our purchase.

They do an great job of cleaning my toilets! Drop it in the bowl, the plastic covering melts right off and dissolves. The foaming action takes place and in about 10 min, you can clean your bowl for an excellent shiny clean!

settings.title: What Happy Customers Are Saying About Our Toilet Pods
Directions For Use
settings.text:
Directions for Use:
Drop one water soluble Fuller Toilet PodÂ® into the toilet bowl.

Let the Pod dissolve and work for you (approximately 10 min.)
Brush & Flush: Brush or swab the toilet bowl above and below the waterline as well as under the rim, then Flush.


Fuller Smart Cleaning Tips:

â€¢ The longer the cleansers remain in the bowl â€“ the better the cleaning action.
â€¢ For extra dirty toilet bowls, two Pods may be used.*
â€¢ Always make sure to use brush to scrub the toilet bowl all over
â€¢ If toilet bowl is clean, Pod may be used as a Bowl Refresher â€“ simply drop 1 in, close the lid and walk away.
â€¢ Pods are a maintenance toilet cleaner. Not intended for deep cleaning or removal of build-up of hard water deposits, limescale or rust stains.
â€¢ The Pods are NOT designed to create any foaming action. As the Pod dissolves, cleansers are released into the water â€“ while a small amount of bubbling occurs.
â€¢ Keep out of reach of children and pets.
â€¢ Pods are made for the toilet bowl only, not for the tank.
